pages.heading: Basic Elixirs
pages.text: The Basic Elixirs are less potent and have a shorter duration than their Advance counterparts.$(br)$(l)Elixir Types:$()$(br)Elixir of Healing$(br)Elixir of Regeneration$(br)Elixir of Night Vision$(br)Elixir of Swiftness$(br)Elixir of Fire Resistance$(br)Elixir of Strength$(br)Elixir of Water Breathing$(br)Elixir of Slow Falling$(br)Elixir of Invisibility$(br)Elixir of Iron Skin

pages.heading: Elixir of Regeneration
pages.text: Restores health by half ♥ every 2.5 seconds.

pages.heading: Elixir of Night Vision
pages.text: Makes everything appear to be at the maximum light level, including underwater areas.

pages.heading: Elixir of Swiftness
pages.text: Increases movement speed, sprinting speed, and jumping length by 20%.

pages.heading: Elixir of Fire Resistance
pages.text: Gives immunity to damage from fire, lava, magma blocks, campfires, and blazes' ranged attacks.

pages.heading: Elixir of Strength
pages.text: Increases player's melee attack damage by 3x ♥ + half ♥.

pages.heading: Elixir of Water Breathing
pages.text: Prevents the oxygen bar from depleting when underwater.

pages.heading: Elixir of Slow Falling
pages.text: Causes the player to fall at a slower rate and not take any damage when hitting the ground.

pages.heading: Elixir of Invisibility
pages.text: Renders the player invisible. Equipped and wielded items are still visible.

pages.heading: Elixir of Iron Skin
pages.text: Adds Armor and Armor Toughness to the player while providing a visual overlay on the skin.
